getGroupByUid: select ?? from `group` where id = (select gid from `usergroup` where uid = ?)
getUserByGid: select ?? from `user` where id = (select uid from `usergroup` where gid = ?)
getVendorByUid: select ?? from `vendor` where vc=0&&id = (select vid from `uservendor` where uid = ?)
getMangeByUid: select ?? from `vendor` where vc=0&&id in (select vid from `uservendor` where uid = ?&&role='ROLE_USER')
getUserByVid: select ?? from `user` where id = (select uid from `uservendor` where vid = ?)
findSignedByUid: SELECT ?? FROM `serviceData` WHERE id IN(SELECT sd FROM `serviceResult` WHERE uid=? ) ORDER BY `ts` DESC  LIMIT ?,?
findAllSignedByUid: SELECT * FROM `serviceData` WHERE id IN(SELECT sd FROM `serviceResult` WHERE uid=? && status=-1 ) ORDER BY `ts` DESC LIMIT ?,?
getVendorChildren: select ?? from vendor where FIND_IN_SET(id, queryChildrenVendor(?))&&vc=0
getVendorFather: select group_concat(id) as vidG from vendor where FIND_IN_SET(id, queryFatherVendor(?))&&vc=0
getUserVendor: SELECT  group_concat(vid) as vidG FROM `uservendor` WHERE uid = ?
getDataTarget: SELECT ?? from `serviceData` WHERE id IN (SELECT sd FROM `serviceDataTarget` WHERE FIND_IN_SET(vid, ?))
getDataTargetBySt: SELECT ?? from `serviceData` WHERE st=?&&id IN (SELECT sd FROM `serviceDataTarget` WHERE FIND_IN_SET(vid, ?))
getVendorList: select ?? from `vendor` where vc=0&&id in (select vid from `uservendor` where uid = ?&&(role='ROLE_VENDOR'||role='ROLE_ADMIN'))
getVendorServiceType: SELECT ?? FROM `serviceType` WHERE id in (select st from `vendorServiceType` where vid=?)
getDataBySd: select ?? from `serviceData` WHERE id IN(SELECT sd FROM `serviceDataTarget` WHERE FIND_IN_SET(vid,?)&& sd = ?)
findDataByStatusSt: SELECT ?? from `serviceData` WHERE id in(select sd FROM `serviceResult` where uid=?&&status=?)&&st=?
getAdminData: SELECT ?? from `serviceData` where id=? && find_in_set(vid,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(vid) FROM `uservendor` WHERE uid = ? && (role='ROLE_ADMIN'||role='ROLE_VENDOR')))
getWeChatTarget: SELECT ?? FROM `user` WHERE FIND_IN_SET(id,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(uid) FROM `uservendor` WHERE FIND_IN_SET(vid,?)))
getRegisterUser: SELECT ?? from `user` where id in (SELECT uid FROM `serviceResult` WHERE sd=?&&status=?)
